snippet: The journalist, Chen Min, who had pressed for the release of a prominent human rights activist, was called to a meeting with security officials in Beijing at around noon on Friday.
abstract: Chinese journalist Chen Min, who pressed for the release of prominent human rights activist Xu Zhiyong, is detained in Beijing, one day after the United States completed annual discussions with China on human rights.
lead_paragraph: The journalist, Chen Min, who had pressed for the release of a prominent human rights activist, was called to a meeting with security officials in Beijing at around noon on Friday.

headline.main: Chinese Journalist Detained in Beijing, One Day After Human Rights Talk With U.S.
headline.print_headline: Chinese Journalist Detained in Beijing, One Day After Human Rights Talk With U.S.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
